thread.title: Egyptian security forces 'mistakenly' kill Mexican tourists
thread.title_full: Egyptian security forces 'mistakenly' kill Mexican tourists

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Egyptian security forces 'mistakenly' kill Mexican tourists
text:
Egyptian security forces 'mistakenly' kill Mexican tourists   
Sep 14, 2015 eTN   
Egyptian security forces mistakenly fired at Mexican tourist convoy during "anti-terrorism operation," killing at least 12 people, including several Mexican tourists, officials say. 
Four tourist buses involved had entered a "banned area" in the Wahat area of the Western Sahara, Egypt's Interior Ministry said in a statement. 
Ten Mexicans and Egyptians were also injured and are being treated in a local hospital. 
The ministry said it had formed a team to investigate the incident.
